evidence.claim: Credence Global Solutions offers services using AWS and Azure cloud infrastructures.
The company works with healthcare standards including HIPAA, FHIR, and X12 for data interoperability.
Integration of EDI formats for healthcare transactions is part of their service offering.
They have a dedicated section on their tech stack including cloud services utilized.
Credence is focused on platform engineering which involves API integrations.

icp.icp_reason: Utilizes health tech for EDI and API integrations with focus on HIPAA and X12.
